Package dev.prozilla.pine.core.state.config

Class LogConfig

java.lang.Object
dev.prozilla.pine.core.state.config.LogConfig
public class LogConfig extends Object
Manages configuration options related to logging.

    • ENABLE_ANSI

      public static final ConfigKey<Boolean> ENABLE_ANSI

    • ENABLE_APPLICATION_STATE_LOGS

      public static final ConfigKey<Boolean> ENABLE_APPLICATION_STATE_LOGS

    • ENABLE_ASSET_POOL_LOGS

      public static final ConfigKey<Boolean> ENABLE_ASSET_POOL_LOGS

    • ENABLE_TIMESTAMPS

      public static final ConfigKey<Boolean> ENABLE_TIMESTAMPS

    • enableLogs

      public final BooleanConfigOption enableLogs
      Enables logs. Defaults to true.

    • prefix

      public final StringConfigOption prefix
      Prefix to add to all logged strings. Defaults to a formatted badge with label "app".

    • outputHandler

      public final ObjectConfigOption<LogHandler> outputHandler
      Log handler for the output log level. Defaults to StandardOutputLogHandler.

    • errorHandler

      public final ObjectConfigOption<LogHandler> errorHandler
      Log handler for the error log level. Defaults to StandardErrorLogHandler.

    • enableAnsi

      public final BooleanConfigOption enableAnsi
      When set to false, all ANSI escape sequences will be stripped from logs. Defaults to true.

    • enableApplicationStateLogs

      public final BooleanConfigOption enableApplicationStateLogs
      Enables logging of state changes of the application. Defaults to true.

    • enableAssetPoolLogs

      public final BooleanConfigOption enableAssetPoolLogs
      Enables logging of asset pool events. Defaults to true.

    • enableTimestamps

      public final BooleanConfigOption enableTimestamps
      Determines whether each log will be preceded by a timestamp. Defaults to false.
